text: us ki is baath se hazrath Sulaiman(alaihissalaam) muskura kar has diye aur dua karne lage aye parvardigaar! tu mujhe taufeeq de ke main teri un nemato ka shukr baja laao jo tu ne mujh par inâ€™aam ki hai aur mere maa baap par aur main aise nek amaal karta raho, jin se tu khush rahe, mujhe apni rehmath se nek bandho mein shaamil karle
